values:
oh man i am so tired

uhhh i was studying for a phsy test until i decided to come online. i then have to write my french repsonces to amelie and thennnnnn start english if i can. i'm tired. have i already mentioned that? i'm not sure what else to say. -sigh- ummmmm this semester is far better than the first. i seriously don't get how some students study like mad, it's so boring. whatever... anyways. my stomach is so full. k i gotta go. bye.

i always think about the guy with such a pretty smile the kind that replaces any thoughts you had in your head before he came along. i think about the older mature, faithful man one with modesty in him, true nature of sensitivity. i think about him, i think about him understanding me but never getting it and it's okay because he is loyal, he is wonderful. he doesn't need to know anything about me, all he needs to do is hold me, smile caringly like he means it. remy, a character in the movie i've just watched was played by the actor in the picture above. he has a french accent though sounds sexier speaking english without it. he's 39 and wow! okay i'm done. ehehehe he's so fucking beautiful and soft spoken, it's totally adorable. the picture is a HORRIBLE one of him OH WELL.

here is my resolution for giving up
well not so much giving up as becoming passive

there is just no use for being "passionate" all the time 

i'm like the floppy corners of a wet page, slowly bending down to shred off.

i am tired of what they tell me
i am tired of thinking and the thoughts that come with it

i just...

need to talk less
for my own sake.

HMMMMMMMMMMMMMMMM

well... seeing that physics requires a lot of math, i'm a little behind in the nearly begun course, and of course i've failed grade ten math. which i skipped today. so, i doubt they are changing courses anymore, though i REALLY need to because i will fail. but i've decided that taking the time during physics to improve my drawing might be handy. also, i can read. 

lately i've been listening to so much electro
i really don't know why.... the music is appealing to me so much

that is all to be said. k good day.

uuuuuuuuuuuuummmmmmmmmm just a message to katie:
be free soon, i'll call you when i get the chance, or call me

yesterday mariam and sarah we're supposed to meet tony et moi by our lockers, NO ONE SHOWED. THEN AFTER AN HOUR AT SCHOOL WE SAW ALYIHA as we were leaving and she told us that they cancelled plans. OKAY IM SORRY I LEFT MARIAMS EARLY THE DAY BEFORE BUT DID IT EVER OCCUR TO YOU TO TELL TONY AND I?! whatever. so tony&i were pissed. anyways. us three went to the movies i saw sherk 2&harry potter. sherk was funnier than i thought it would be. whattt else. oh yeah today i'm supposed to be going to michael's but it's my brother's birthday, sadly no one remembered until my sister at 5pm yelled out "OH AKASH ITS YOUR BIRTHDAY". it's cruel. anyways so we're going out for that. i dont' care about hanging out only if they give me trainspotting to watch, because i suggested it and I WANT TO WATCH IT. saturday i'm free, sunday i have this family pinic/party to attend that we have serveral times a year. there's an arguement happening, i guess we're not giong anywhere. so i'm going to ask to go now.

today doesn't have teh equivalence of a sad day, it is more along the lines of the sun soaking any depression that i have in me

today, i will burn 
and grow darker

charity week keeps getting worse as the years pass

braaah
i had no idea period four started at 12:15.... fuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuucccccccccccck

katie, the other day i was at Rona (is that what it's called?) and i remembered, 'oh katie's hot bother works here' 
i didn't see him but i thought of you!
even if he doesn't work there and you didn't tell me that, i still thought of you.

i saw hopesfall
i saw from autumn to ashes
i saw most precious blood
i saw silversiten
i will give more detail to teh stuff that happened before, becuas there needs to be exposed of some emotional. so yeah. and i have go to.

nothing happens the way you think they will, so it's why i don't like to make any plans. you know? yeah, i'm bored and you can notice it by the amount of posts that i have been making of today. i really don't know what to do inside of my own house anymore. i should make a goal for myself, it will keep busy. oka yokay . i have one... mmmm. i should. i shuold... i should. fuck. okay i will finish the mrs.keyes book that i bought and then i will buy another.

and i will keep my room reguarly clean

OH OH OH OH 
I'M GOING SOMEHWERE
PLACCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCCES.

since i have so much time on my hands, i think i'm also going to write long notes to people... mmmm wait until i seee you at schooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooool.

and if you happen to read this post, tell me what you think my main weakness is. i'd like to hear it. and yeahh.

i just saw misha say something so i'm like hey why not i say something too

so misha... guess what?

i'll tell you at school :) it's cool shit.

i love you bye.

<center>poetic madness drains from my mind.
you've fucked me there too many times.
heart in throat.
I'm all choked up.
I wish I was.
now give me sanity.
this is the love I can't control and now you've lost it.
and you're just so fucking crazy.
you make me crazy.
dopesick and depressed, but she's magnetic.
she's so magnetic.
you make me crazy.
you make me so fucking crazy.
a bittersweet orgasmic mindfuck
or the smoothest sheet of something stainless will pleasure me for now.
and now I find myself where the needle was too weak.
and now I find myself where the razor couldn't speak.
now cover me in your green essence lovely.
distance where I can't touch you.
that's where the gun will touch you.
paint up that pretty face you're something I wish I was.
paint up that pretty face.
give me this agony.
paint up that pretty face.
her makeup smears away with the tears.
that eye-liners runnin and she's runnin away from me.
the lipstick stains like gold and for that moment I wanted to be her.
feeling how I failed her.
and now the drama bites hard.
you're the poison in the bottle in that just knocked me out.
a simulcast signing off yeah mind controls a bitch.
I'm on that downer depressant.
that overcast chill and she's just so fucking sexy.
yeah. lips like sin. die like sin.
I'm on that downer depressant.
that overcast chill.
she's dressed in black and dressed to kill.
champagne and sleeping pills,
-18V
